channel.title: Comments on: Modest Mouse “Missed the Boat” video

item.title: By: logan
item.dc:creator: logan
item.description:
even weaker than this colbert/decemberist rip-off, they played last night (tues, aug 7th) on conan:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cEaMMjbdCrE
their last few tv appearances have left me decidedly non-plussed, esp. the recent austin city limits re-run - split w/ GBV. no marr on this one though. so i'm not surprised something like this would happen:
http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/page/news/43551-brock-beaned-with-bottle-modest-mouse-cancel-shows
item.content:encoded:
even weaker than this colbert/decemberist rip-off, they played last night (tues, aug 7th) on conan:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cEaMMjbdCrE

their last few tv appearances have left me decidedly non-plussed, esp. the recent austin city limits re-run – split w/ GBV. no marr on this one though. so i’m not surprised something like this would happen:

http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/page/news/43551-brock-beaned-with-bottle-modest-mouse-cancel-shows

item.title: By: k
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: I liked the <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ogharitmxSc" rel="nofollow">photocopy </a> one better. (<a href="http://www.metafilter.com/63581/A-modest-effort" rel="nofollow">via</a>)
item.content:encoded: I liked the photocopy one better. (via)
